sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>The character removes 1 setback die per rank of Codebreaker from his attempts to break codes or decrypt communications. In addition, the character decreases the difficulty of his Computers and Intellect checks made to break codes or decrypt communications by one (this does not increase with additional ranks of Codebreaker).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Codebreaker</name> <number>TAL0001016</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 16:43:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8bd50628db660c542901de90cf96196f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-12-31 20:25:57</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
